title: #477: Saturn Worship, Mars Slave Colonies and Human History Is Actually Only 4000 Years Old with Ari Asulin
description:
Thank you so much for tuning in for Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode we welcome Independent Researcher, Ari Auslin, to the show to discuss his research into the deception that is our Human History! Buckle up, Buttercup because this one goes deep.

July 30th: Dallas, Tx with the Tin Foil Hat Comedy Night at Hyennas 2 Shows
8pm- Stand Up Comedy- https://www.prekindle.com/promo/id/531433527640384767

July 31st: Oklahoma City- TFH Comedy Night Live from the Bricktown Comedy Club
